attributes.action: Review the voting in a general election to fair means and to ensure any new PMs do an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The voting system in this country needs a review. As the voting is not a fair representation of the votes placed. Also any change in Prime minister should face a general election. If the new Prime minister is any good they should have nothing to fear by having an immediate election. It should not be down to party politics to decide the future of this great nation without putting this to the vote of the general public. If politicans had backbone and meant what they said they would have to deliver with a fair voting system rather than keep moving the goal post.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
